definition: Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: Fromthat day on, we were ever so faithful to Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 從那天起，我們對耶穌無比的忠誠又更深一層了。

sentences.english: But the price for such solidarity will be very high.
sentences.chinese: 但毫無疑問這種團結的代價將無比高昂。

sentences.english: And there dwell in this comely garden white peacocks and peacocks that have blue breasts.
sentences.chinese: 在這秀美無比的花園裏住着白孔雀和藍胸孔雀。

sentences.english: Only listens to the F1 vehicle race the engine bellow, you return think very excitedly.
sentences.chinese: 光聽F1賽車的引擎轟鳴聲，你就回覺得無比興奮。

sentences.english: She told them how much it grieved her that they were separated.
sentences.chinese: 她們斷絕往來，她感到無比難受。

sentences.english: They seem indifferent actually very eager to help with chihiro.
sentences.chinese: 她們表面上冷漠實際上卻無比熱心的幫助着千尋。

sentences.english: Now, let me point out that it's not always nefarious.
sentences.chinese: 現在，我要指出的是，這種事並不總是那麼邪惡無比。

sentences.english: Complicated as it seems, English grammar has its basic rules.
sentences.chinese: 英語語法看似繁複無比，其實萬變不離其宗。

sentences.english: Snowcapped mountain tops glisten in the strong Alpine sunshine.
sentences.chinese: 阿爾卑斯山的陽光讓山頭覆蓋的雪景，閃亮無比。

sentences.english: Never has an invitation been accepted with more enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 世界上從沒有哪份邀請會受到賓客無比熱情的歡迎。

sentences.english: If encounter without, although fine but can be trapped large prey, tenacity and clinking.
sentences.chinese: 若遇若無，雖細卻可以困住很大的獵物，堅韌無比。

sentences.english: Women find it wussy, and it annoys the heck out of them.
sentences.chinese: 女人覺得這是懦弱無能的表現，對這點她們厭惡無比。

sentences.english: Our life receives the generous gifts by nature, its superior is incomparable.
sentences.chinese: 我們的生命受到自然的厚賜，它是優越無比的。

sentences.english: And our vivacious, playful Cassis Rose fragrance just radiates bliss.
sentences.chinese: 活潑可人的黑莓玫瑰香氛散發着無比快活的氣息。

sentences.english: With brief eye contact and slight smile, I felt incomparably happy right at that moment.
sentences.chinese: 簡短的對視和輕輕微笑，一霎那，我幸福無比。

sentences.english: The bean curd looks spotlessly white and tender.
sentences.chinese: 豆腐看上去潔白無瑕，喫起來鮮嫩無比。

definition: to feel/to sense/to detect/to perceive/to become aware
to have guts/to have courage/to be brave
to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]
but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
